import React from "react"; import { FaVideo, FaUpload, FaClipboardCheck } from "react-icons/fa"; // Icons for steps import "../DscUp/dscup.css"; const VideoVerificationSteps = () => { return (

How to Do DSC Video Verification

Step 1: Prepare for Recording

  • Find a well-lit environment.
  • Ensure your face and government-issued ID are clearly visible.

Step 2: Record Your Video

  1. Click "Start Recording".
  2. Clearly state your full name and DSC details.
  3. Hold your government-issued ID next to your face.
  4. Click "Stop Recording" when done.

Step 3: Upload Your Video

  • Click "Upload Video".
  • Wait for successful upload confirmation.

Step 4: Submit for Verification

  • Copy the video verification link.
  • Share it with the support team for approval.
{/* Updated Button to Open Pantasign in a New Tab */}
); }; export default VideoVerificationSteps;
